file_insights.note: All files contain only metadata, no actual selectors populated yet

patterns_discovered: Uniform JSON structure across all 8 files
Turkish language country names (ulke) paired with ISO-like country codes
Standardized provider field: 'vfs' for all files
Placeholder notation in notlar field referencing future 'live site reconnaissance'
gotchas_discovered: Files are skeleton structures with no actual CSS selector data
Placeholder state creates technical debt - requires completion before functionality
No JSON schema validation mentioned for these configuration files
Turkish language implementation may require translation mapping for international teams
Dependency on external 'live site reconnaissance' phase not yet scheduled

approach_outcome.commit_quality: single atomic commit with clear messaging

recommendations: Create JSON schema (schema.json) to validate selector configuration structure
Document the selector population procedure/checklist for live site reconnaissance phase
Add timestamp fields (_created, _updated) to track configuration state changes
Implement validation script to verify required selector fields are present before production use
Consider creating a base template file to ensure consistency for future country additions
Add version field to track schema changes
